meta.title: Home - Christian Devotionals
meta.description: Christian Devotionals is your mobile companion to enrich your spiritual life with daily biblical reflections. Download the free app and strengthen your faith every day.

header.title: Christian Devotionals
header.subtitle: Your Daily Spiritual Companion
header.description: Strengthen your faith with inspiring biblical reflections and spiritual content designed to nourish your soul every day.

vision.title: Our Vision for Christian Devotionals
vision.description: Christian Devotionals is your mobile companion designed to enrich and strengthen your spiritual life. Our goal is to be your daily bridge to God's word, offering inspiring and relevant biblical content. We believe in technology serving your faith, providing a fluid, fast, and reliable experience completely free of charge.

daily.title: Daily Devotionals
daily.description: Access a new biblical reflection every day, designed to inspire and nourish your spirit.

versions.title: Bible Versions
versions.description: Enjoy devotionals in different Bible versions, such as RVR1960, for deeper study.

favorites.title: Mark Your Favorites
favorites.description: Save those devotionals that touch you most to easily revisit them whenever you want.

sharing.title: Share the Word
sharing.description: Spread inspiration by sharing devotionals as text or beautiful images through your networks.

prayer.title: Prayer of Faith
prayer.description: A special message to give your life to Jesus Christ and live eternally.

language.title: Multiple Languages
language.description: Designed for expansion, currently optimized for Spanish-speaking users.

notifications.title: Personalized Notifications
notifications.description: Receive daily reminders of your devotional at the time you choose, so you don't miss your moment with God.

themes.title: Customize Your Theme
themes.description: Choose from different color combinations to adapt the interface to your taste.

darkMode.title: Dark Mode (Low Light)
darkMode.description: Enjoy comfortable reading in low-light environments, reducing eye strain.

contact.title: Questions? Contact Us!
contact.description: If you have any questions, suggestions, or just want to say hello, don't hesitate to get in touch with us.
contact.supportText: Your support helps us continue sharing the word.
